column3: West,, on a plane bound west
column4: I see her stretching out below
column6: The place where i was born
column7: Scars,, yeah shes got her scars
column8: Sometimes it starts to worry me
column9: Cause lose,, i dont wanna lose
column19: Its been a long hard ride
column21: But this is still the place
column26: Though it sometimes means we dont get along
column27: Cause same,, no we're not the same
column28: But thats what makes us strong
column36: To chase that dream across the sea
column37: Names,, and they signed their names
column39: Red,, how the blood ran red
column40: And we laid our dead in sacred ground
column41: Just think,, wonder what they think
column42: If they could see us now
column47: Its been a long hard ride
